snippet: With the election of Martin J. Walsh as mayor, Boston is poised to break out of the mold cast by Mayor Thomas M. Menino, who is widely credited with transforming the city during his 20-year tenure.
abstract: Boston is poised to break out of mold cast by Mayor Thomas M Menino with election of Martin J Walsh, state legislator and union leader who promises new era of transparency and equality; Menino, who did not seek re-election due to health issues, is widely credited with transforming Boston into world-class city during his 20-year tenure.
lead_paragraph: With the election of Martin J. Walsh as mayor, Boston is poised to break out of the mold cast by Mayor Thomas M. Menino, who is widely credited with transforming the city during his 20-year tenure.

headline.main: Transition Begins in Boston, for First Time in a Generation
headline.print_headline: Transition Begins in Boston, For First Time in a Generation
